text: Coulomby is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region of France. ==Geography== A small farming village situated 10 miles (16 km) west of Saint-Omer, at the D191 and D204 crossroads, just off the N42. ==Population== ==Places of interest== * The church of St.Martin, dating from the sixteenth century. * Ruins of a thirteenth-century chateau. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * Coulomby on the Insee website Category:Communes of Pas- de-Calais
title: Coulomby
